title: Helvetica auction ends Freitag
content:
Still time to bid on ten copies of the limited edition DVD and Gary’s Freitag bag

[http://search.ebay.com/\_W0QQsassZplexigary](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224165818/http:/search.ebay.com/_W0QQsassZplexigary "http://search.ebay.com/\_W0QQsassZplexigary")

 [‹ Font Poll](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224165818/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39797 "Go to previous forum topic") [A Holiday Gift From P22 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224165818/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40145 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sii

comments.content:
Cool - the bag went for $727, and people paid between $78 and $178! for one of ten copies of the limited edition. All in all, a pretty nice haul.

[http://cgi6.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?MfcISAPICommand=ViewListedItems&si...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224165818/http:/cgi6.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?MfcISAPICommand=ViewListedItems&since=30&userid=plexigary&include=0&rows=50&sort=3&completed=1 "http://cgi6.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?MfcISAPICommand=ViewListedItems&since=30&userid=plexigary&include=0&rows=50&sort=3&completed=1")

not any more \*yawn\* than most things.

On another charity auction front, looks like handwriting is a better bet than typesetting.  
 [http://www.amazon.com/gp/feature.html?docId=1000179911](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224165818/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/feature.html?docId=1000179911 "http://www.amazon.com/gp/feature.html?docId=1000179911")  
perhaps Gary can auction off his production notes...(with skull drawings)
The bag was an especially sweet one.

Sorry Sii, I’ve been Helveticaed to death. Helvetica numb. And if I read of one more PR stunt from Helvetica I’m going puke eggnog all over my ’puter screen.

Happiness of holidays to you too!
